name: Beasts of Cheniel
description: Beasts of Cheniel will be an RPG about a group of monsters fighting against the hero character and finding out what's causing the "wild" monsters to go crazy. It's being made in RPG Maker 2000 and is currently in very early development. This is basically just here because I felt like showing what I have done. Everything except the terrain is RPG Maker's built-in assets right now but I'm going to make the rest too, hopefully.
